tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE blockchain_security_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    event_type VARCHAR(50),
    source_address VARCHAR(100),
    destination_address VARCHAR(100),
    amount DECIMAL(18, 8),
    details JSON
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_logs (
    log_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    event_description TEXT,
    user_id INT,
    ip_address VARCHAR(50)
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_activity_logs (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    user_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE suspicious_activity_alerts (
    alert_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
    alert_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    logged_by_user_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE security_audit_logs (
    log_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    timestamp TIMESTAMPTZ NOT NULL,
    action_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    remarks TEXT,
    actor_id INT
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
  transaction_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
  user_id UUID NOT NULL,
  block_number INT NOT NULL,
  transaction_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  transaction_timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE blockchain_transactions (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    hash VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    sender_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    receiver_address VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL,
    amount DECIMAL NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE suspicious_activity (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    transaction_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    activity_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE user_logs (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    user_id INTEGER NOT NULL,
    action_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE security_alerts (
    id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    alert_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    description TEXT,
    status BOOLEAN NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL
);
